Set up template data sience project folder — create_project_folder
text: path Path directory set template folder. verbose Boolean, message displayed step? Default value TRUE.

title: Set up template data sience project folder — create_project_folder
text: Sets directory given path follows: Creates folders data/, output/ reports; Creates ammend .gitignore file exclude targets files folders; Creates template RMarkdown files make_targets_pipeline.Rmd data_cleaning.Rmd; Creates template RMardown file results.Rmd reports/ folder. See vignette("create_project_folder") information template use .
